dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 5478 IH: Northern Mariana Islands Enhanced Nutrition Assistance Act of 2018
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Sablan introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Agriculture

form.official-title: To amend the Agricultural Act of 2014 to make funds available for the Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands pilot project for fiscal years 2019 through 2023.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Northern Mariana Islands Enhanced Nutrition Assistance Act of 2018.
Section 4031(e)(2) of the Agricultural Act of 2014 (Public Law 113–79; 48 U.S.C. 1841 note) is amended—

subparagraph.text: by striking subparagraph (B) and inserting subparagraphs (B) and (C);
in clause (i) by striking and at the end;

clause.text: by striking the period at the end and inserting ; and; and
by adding at the end the following:
$8,500,000 for each of the fiscal years 2019 through 2023.

paragraph.text: in subparagraph (B) by striking If and inserting Subject to subparagraph (C), if; and
by adding at the end the following:

subparagraph.text: Notwithstanding subparagraph (B), no funds available under subparagraph (A)(iii) may be provided under subparagraph (B) for a fiscal year if the amount of unexpended funds that remain available under subparagraph (B)(ii) as of January 1 immediately preceding the first day of such fiscal year exceeds $8,500,000.
